title: [Large-Scale] Problem- and Case-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Elementary Education Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theories of elementary mathematics education and classroom instruction experience
context.additional_context: Enables blended activities using digital devices (tablets/laptops), structured around practical, field-case-based components

learning_goals: Identify at least three mathematics education challenges in real classroom settings and propose solutions.

Learners can reflect on at least three peer feedbacks and develop a simulation-based lesson plan (including 5W1H structure), achieving a grade of 'B+' or higher in at least four out of five instructor evaluation rubric items.
Design a mathematics instruction improvement project plan applying action research methodology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
